title: LINE : number of monthly active users 2014 to 2016

summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monthly users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.

The difference of Number of monthly users in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 50.0.
